mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, b.name as userName, a.hit, date_format(a.date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as date, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc
select title, contents, hit , user_no as userNo from board where no = #{no }
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title }, contents = #{contents }, date = now() where no = #{no }
update board set hit = (SELECT(max(hit)+1)) where no = #{no }
